trans-unit.source:
This option allows you to modify the background color of the left menu - modules menu - according to the domain on which you are. Each domain values will be tested by regular expression to the current web domain - matching the $_SERVER[HTTP_HOST] variable: if there is a match, the assigned color will be applied. You can enter several domains, in case your database is exported and imported into one of your subdomains.
For example, for the following domains:
www.example.com -> www\.example,
www.dev.example.com -> dev ou dev\.example, etc.
